markers.marker: Sanako is off to a bad start.
Sanako thinks a princess is just in costume.
Sanako has some baked goodies for everyone after the game.
Sanako blames the heat for her skirt removal.
Sanako invites everybody to introduce themselves.
Sanako isn't taking off her glasses because it would break her disguise. But you can take off yours.
Sanako asks permission to refer to an opponent by her name.
Sanako observes that we're pressing a sarcastic girl's buttons.
If any males are playing, Sanako might remark that she sometimes enjoys going out with younger guys.
Sanako shows off her "womanly ways". (i.e. her breasts)
If Nagisa is not playing, Sanako can almost introduce herself as her real age.
Sanako is happy to let the human male player "take the lead".
Sanako asks if Kyu is from the drama club.
Sanako reacts to Natsuki claiming to be in the same club as the player.
Sanako calls Navi an orb of light and suggests that she can grant wishes.
Sanako mistakes Remilia's wings as being part of a costume.
Sanako mistakes Zone-tan's bare shoulders for a strapless bra.
